meanings.definition: To mark or identify with a flag.
meanings.sent1: She reflags her mailbox every year with a new flag.
meanings.sent2: The explorer reflags the trail to guide hikers.
meanings.sent3: The pirate reflags his ship with a bright red flag for a festive look.
meanings.sent4: The teacher reflags the important sections of the textbook for easy reference.
meanings.sent5: The gardener reflags the plants with colorful markers to remember their names.

meanings.definition: To change or update the flags on something.
meanings.sent1: He reflags the map to show the new boundaries.
meanings.sent2: The technician reflags the network to improve security.
meanings.sent3: The chef reflags the menu with daily specials.
meanings.sent4: The designer reflags the website for a fresh look.
meanings.sent5: The student reflags the document with new information.

meanings.definition: To signal or communicate using flags.
meanings.sent1: The ship reflags its position to the nearby vessels.
meanings.sent2: The semaphore system reflags messages across long distances.
meanings.sent3: The team reflags their strategy with different colored flags.
meanings.sent4: The referee reflags the play with a penalty flag.
meanings.sent5: The scout reflags the trail for the group to follow.
